name: Tumblr Dark 2021
description: This theme applies to the new Tumblr dashboard, as well as some parts of x-kit. It's intended for those that don't want to go "full gothic" with Tumblr new dark mode, but still want a dark theme that will apply everywhere. It also removes the "sponsored" advertising that appears in the dashboard. For the lastest version visit my repository, since I won't be updating this theme here anymore.
